name: MyAudio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my audio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play your own audio files, be it your own meditation, prayers , motivational audios or any other audio files you would like to play.
Now you don't have to search for your favourite audios on mobile and play them , just invoke them on Alexa device and enjoy!.
You can also play mulitple audios in a playlist and use them in routine too.

HOW IT WORKS:-
1) Enable the skill and while enabling perform the account linking with the amazon's account.(Account linking is needed to play your own audios on your device)
2) Login into https://personalaudio.in/ with the same amazon's account.
3) You have a choice to play single audio files or multiple audios as a playlist.
4) To play single audio files, on the left panel click "Single Audio Files" then on the right side of website upload your audio file with an invocation name.
5) To play multiple audios as a playlist , on the left panel click "Playlist" then on the right top side click "Create New Playlist".
6) Enter a playlist name and click Save and close the popup.
7) Now you can upload mulitple audio files by clicking "Add More Audios in playlist".
8) After uploading the audios, launch the skill by saying "Alexa, open my audio" and when asked, speak the 
 same invocation name/playlist name which you have given in the above step and enjoy your audios.
9) While listening to playlist, you can use commands like "Next", "Previous" to play next and previous audios.
 
5) You can also add them in your Alexa Routines, to use this skill in the routine please read the "How To" section of the website.

For any technical issues while using this skill send an email to myaudio@personalaudio.in.
